text: aur khuda ne jo fazal va karam un par kiya hai usakee (khushee) se phoole nahin samaate aur jo log unase peechhe rah gae aur unamen aakar shaamil nahin hue unakee nisbat ye (khyaal karake) khushiyo manaate hain ki (ye bhee shaheed hon to) unapar na kisee qism ka khauf hoga aur na aazurda khaatir honge
